archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Set Product Offering Price
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Set (create) a variety of prices such as recurring, non-recurring, discounts, allowances.

properties.value: Set Product Offering Price sets (creates) a variety of prices such as recurring, non-recurring, discounts, allowances. Price events that trigger a price are also defined by creating an event and associating it with a price. Additionally, the applicability of a price to one or more geographic areas are defined.
